title: Focaccia with garlic and rosemary
description: This bread is delicious eaten on the day it is baked, but it will keep for a few days and you can freshen it up in the oven for a few minutes just before serving.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz strong white bread flour, plus extra for dusting
semolina or dried breadcrumbs, for sprinkling
1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, plus extra for drizzling
needles of 2 rosemary branches, finely chopped
